g.text: The whole sequence usually finished in 16.66ms(1000ms/60Hz).
Weston leave 7ms to be used by weston_output_repaint() before
So there may be about 9ms idle before weston_output_repaint().
And some more idle if weston_output_repaint() using less than
only be started during the VBLANK.
So there are idle between the two.
Please, do not care about the
meaning of the arrows by uml . I
have no idea what the arrows mean
but only use them for the order of
But, if there is a new frame drawn. The
idle_repaint() would be triggered and the
timer would be updated before timeout.
